title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Skills: Understanding and Applying Dissolved Oxygen Control in Wastewater Treatment Processes

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental mathematics and understanding of basic wastewater treatment processes
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can explain the importance and control requirements of dissolved oxygen (DO) in wastewater treatment processes.
Learners understand the fundamental principles of intelligent control systems based on fuzzy logic and Q-learning.
Learners perform DO control simulations using smartphone apps even in constrained technical environments.
Learners apply control strategies to real wastewater treatment scenarios through project-based assessments.
Learners can collaborate with team members to propose optimization plans for DO control systems.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
